body.name: Trick Shot: A Spicy Christmas Novella (Brother Puckers Book 1)
body.description: *** Now a Top 20 Amazon Best Seller! ***Leo McKnight, an identical twin to a famous hockey player, finds himself caught up in a case of mistaken identity on Christmas Eve.When Leo unexpectedly bumps into the captivating Riley at the airport, he's both amused and intrigued by her assumption that he's his renowned brother. Embracing his mischievous side, Leo decides to play along, relishing in their flirty banter and clever exchanges.But as fate would have it, their flight gets canceled, and Leo seizes the opportunity to spend more time with Riley. With a devilish glint in his eye, he invites her to spend the night at his penthouse. With an intriguing woman, his best friend Jace, and a whole night of possibilities ahead of them, Leo has all the ingredients for what promises to be a memorable Christmas Eve.In "Trick Shot," a spicy MMF Christmas novella, Leo, Riley, and Jace embark on a passionate and unconventional romance that challenges societal norms. As they navigate their desires and explore the boundaries of their connection, they discover that love knows no bounds, especially during the enchanting holiday season.So snuggle up with a cozy blanket, indulge in a cup of steaming hot cocoa, and allow the magic of Christmas to transport you into this sexy novella.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Great to see something new and different.
reviews.reviewText: Currently reading this book at a snails pace before bed. I'm not a holiday person nor do i celebrate x-mas, but I picked up this book as an impulse buy because I saw it was both body positive and a little bit kinky. I immidiately looked up the author for validation and after it checked all my boxes I ordered it as a spicey, fun thing for me and my husband to do to unwind together. I love the pov and enjoy the variety in it. I LOVE the blatant and flagrant cussing, it makes me feel like an adult while giggling like a child. And I love that it reflects a lot of the reality of being a plus sized person while being utterly fantastical. I have never read a book like this before and now im going to buy them all. This woman is doing gods work out here.XOXOXOXO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Whoooo boy. I definitely needed a fan and some iced tea reading this one.Short, sweet, and SPICY. It’s a novella so ofc it came with the instalove one expects, but it felt right. Intense from the jump. The boys were sweet and the fact that the size inclusion in this book wasn’t limited to the fmc was just ✨chef’s kiss✨.We love a fluffy Daddy.On that note, I also love that while fmc’s struggles with fatphobia were acknowledged, they weren’t the focus of her arc. I’ve noticed that usually when the fmc is plus sized, fatphobia is either not acknowledged or it’s her whole personality. So it was nice to see a larger body normalized while also acknowledging (without sensationalizing) the social issues that come with it.Okay, I’m off the soapbox.This book had some of the best spice I’ve read in a long time. It did read a bit like a Kink Bingo sometimes, but I’m honestly not even mad about it.I’ll definitely be picking this author up again and I can’t wait to get my paws on some of their longer stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: We all know why we picked this story up (don’t lie to yourself, we know which list Santa has you on…) so I was a bit shocked to find there was more plot than spice to this story. Unfortunately with it being a short novella it made the plot feel very shallow which left me wanting more overall from this story.BUT I also came into this expecting cover to cover spice based on people’s reviews… if you don’t mind a short mindless fun story that’s great for a quick holiday read with a dash of spicy taboo romance then this may be the story for you.𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝗻𝘀 𝗼𝗳➵ holiday novella➵ MMF➵ double p3n€treat!øn➵ spank!ng➵ bv++ play➵ decor as tøys➵ light k!nk (d@ddy/sir/degradat!øn)𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗹𝗹 3.5/5⭐️ | 𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗰𝘆 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁 3/5🌶️ | 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝘁 𝗳𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿 3/5🔥

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm me up for Christmas
reviews.reviewText: Loved this.Now disclaimer. It's spicy as heck. Don't even pretend like it's not. But it was exactly what my cold heart needed to lighten up for Christmas 💕Had been in a "reading slump" the last few I read just were not really my thing or I struggled to get through them... I had seen tons and TONS of recs to read this one and boy am I glad I did! It's short but not lacking and it's sweet. I love the dynamic types of characters and though there isn't much it I didn't feel like it was just ridiculous. I thought it was really well written and plot was interwoven in it very nicely. Character backgrounds were just enough without being too much, there was some drama, but nothing bad and a great happy ending. I really love the relationships that developed between the characters and felt like the dynamic was exactly what was needed and I'm a sucker for a bad boy who is sweet to his girl (and guy). Yes PLEASE.For the spice, was it absolutely filth? No, it was a lot but I didn't think it was real farfetched kink at all. Again well written and that makes a heck of a difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars body positive book!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved this book! It’s a cute and fun christmassy themed book with lots of yummy spice! But on top of all that goodness the FMC is a plus size girl that’s not always so convenient. I think we can all relate to the low confidence at some time or another. Where a lot of authors make plus size girls In their books sound unrealistic this author points out all the “flaws”but has the men loving her more for those. I absolutely love how this author made this body positive but in the best way. Pointing out all the insecurities and showing her grow in her confidence and having these drool worthy men help her get there. Quick read and definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best Christmas read.. EVER
reviews.reviewText: This books should come with a warning label that says “have a change of clothes on hand” because PHEW… this was a steamy read! This book was definitely written for reader’s pleasure 😉. If you are looking for a steamy, spicy, Christmas novella, this is the book to read!!Come join Riley, Jace and Leo for some Christmas cocktail fun 🎄😉✨ (this and MMF book)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars quick, spicy read!
reviews.reviewText: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️.5🌶🌶🌶🌶🖤 MMF💕 Opposites Attract🔥 Novella💋 Curvy HeroineHoly heck this book was hot! If you’re looking for excellent spice, then this is the book for you! It was a quick read. We don’t dive into much plot, but honestly, I didn’t need it in this book. It had extra-hot men and had me needing a glass of cold water at the end. Leo is the guy who has been living in this brother’s shadow for quite some time, so when the beautiful and bubbly Riley confuses him with his hot-shot brother, he doesn’t correct her. They aren’t able to fly due to weather, so Leo invites Riley back to his penthouse for some fun. She decides to let loose and says yes and goes with Leo back to his penthouse. Leo wants to give her a night she’ll never forget, so he enlists his best friend/love of his life to help give her all that she needs. Jace is ready and willing to rock Riley’s world, so the three of them engage in one of the hottest nights of their lives. Of course, things don’t always go as planned, so when Riley finds out the truth about Leo in the morning, she is hurt beyond belief. She never expected such a strong connection with two strangers, and Leo and Jace can’t help but feel that Riley is the missing piece in their lives. Great read!
Definitely a spicy little love story. Addicted right from the start. If you are looking for a sweet and spicy Christmas love story this book is for you.
Es una historia sencilla pero buena, no te vas a arrepentir de leerla, es súper divertida y spicy.Simplemente me encanto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: If there were 8 stars or 10 it would get it
reviews.reviewText: Thoroughly enjoyed this book. Extremely spicy and sultry and detailed.I could have read another 200 pages as it might be a bit short.Leo, Jace and Riley make a great Throuple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 5, 2024

reviews.reviewText: OMG.🥵🥵🥵I think I might changed 3times my panties…That was so HOT!! And yet so confy, and lovely, I felt in safe place during my reading.I’m now going to read the next one and maybe put some waterproof sheets… 🥵
